description: {"blocks":[{"key":"243vs","text":"This protocol outlines the procedures for expression and purification of Mouse (Mus Musculus) E1-like enzyme ATG7 (AuTophaGy-related protein) of the ATG8 ubiquitin-like conjugation system in autophagy.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":80,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"6j22f","text":"General information: expression system: Sf9 cells, medium: SF921+Pen/Strep; plasmid origin: Gammoh Noor (University of Edinburgh); internal lab Construct Database number: SMC911; backbone: pFast-BacHT(B); resistance: Ampicillin/Gentamicin; insert: Mus musculus ATG7, Isoform 2_NP_00124647.1; tags \u0026 cleavage sites: N-term 6xHis, followed by Tobacco Etch Virus (TEV) cleavage site, 6xHis-TEVcs-mATG7; protein length without tags: 698 aa; Epsilon (all Cysteines reduced, with tags) = 88810 M-1 cm-1 ; MW with tags= 83 kDa; ORF (only mATG7): ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20},{"style":"italic","offset":248,"length":12},{"style":"sup","offset":489,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":494,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8sspu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ku0v","text":"MGDPGLAKLQFAPFNSALDVGFWHELTQKKLNEYRLDEAPKDIKGYYYNGDSAGLPTRLTLEFSAFDMSA VINAALGFDTFVVMRHGLKKPKQQGAGDLCPSHLVAPADLGSSLFANIPGYKLGCYFCNDVVAPGDSTRD RTLDQQCTVSRPGLAVIAGALAVELMVSVLQHPEGGYAIASSSDDRMNEPPTSLGLVPHQIRGFLSRFDN VLPVSLAFDKCTACSPKVLDQYEREGFTFLAKVFNSSHSFLEDLTGLTLLHQETQAAEIWDMSDEETV","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h307","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8g8lc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"es82e","text":" and Coomassie BB stained gel of His-tag affinity purification.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Screen Shot 2021-02-14 at 12.42.13 materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"ffavj","text":"Materials and Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dslek","text":"Sf9 insect cells","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4o1k","text":"SF921 medium with antibiotics 100 IU/ml Penicillin and 100 µg/ml Streptomycin","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4gj1m","text":"sterile cell culture hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"445fs","text":"27°C shaker incubator","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5elal","text":"sterile flasks/sterile pipettes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmhfp","text":"Baculovirus for mATG7 (SMC911)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eai75","text":"douncer 40 mL","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26v14","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ek9g","text":"Materials for Protein Purification","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bm45i","text":"Lysis Buffer: 50mM Hepes pH=7.5; 300mM NaCl, Benzonase (1μl/50ml lysis buffer), 10mM Imidazole, 2mM MgCl2, 1mM Dithiothreitol, 1xProtease Inhibitors/50 ml lysis buffer (EDTA-free CIP tablet, Roche). ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13},{"style":"sub","offset":104,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ackt5","text":"Buffer A: 50mM Hepes pH=7.5, 300mM NaCl, 10mM Imidazole (filtered and degassed) + 1mM β-mercaptoethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhsit","text":"Buffer B: 50mM Hepes pH=7.5, 300mM NaCl, 300mM Imidazole (filtered and degassed) + 1mM β-mercaptoethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60jf9","text":"SEC Buffer: 25mM Hepes pH=7.5, 150mM NaCl (filtered and degassed) + 1mM Dithiothreitol. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lf5q","text":"Note: all purification buffers are filtered and degassed. Reducing agents (β-mercaptoethanol and Dithiothreitol) are added after degassing step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3sb30","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2ouq","text":"Columns: - HT 5ml column (GE Healthcare) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53gvl","text":"                    - S200_16/60 (GE Healthcare)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ns7l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9a2f","text":"Gels: 10% Poly-acrylamide SDS-gels ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8midl","text":"Infect   of Sf9 cells growing in Sf921 medium with Penicillin/Streptomycin at 1-1.5 mil/ml cells/volume at 99-100% viability in log phase with Virus 1 (V1) according to viral titer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":143,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4gon6","text":"(NOTE: protein yield from 1 lt culture is high, e.i. 32 mg/1lt culture).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mhmc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","guid":"70A5DD506F0511EBAF54B583C798CF21","id":0,"label":"culture","unit":3}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d1s04","text":"Monitor infection and harvest cells when viability goes to 97-98%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"de2ig","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b1sj8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3rovs","text":"Always check under microscope: when all alive cells are brightly fluorescent and only few dead -\u003e harvest!","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3fq3n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6vn9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"brm0u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9ntrq","text":"This section describes the procedure for His-Trap affinity purification followed by Size Exclusion Chromatography. All steps are to be executed at 4°C or on ice.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"26dtl","text":"Resuspend cell pellet corresponding to    in  ; gently stir at   until pellet dissolves avoiding bubbling.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fg22j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","guid":"B202F5306F0511EBAF54B583C798CF21","id":0,"label":"culture","unit":3}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","guid":"BB9584F06F0511EBAF54B583C798CF21","id":0,"label":"ice cold lysis buffer","unit":2}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"BEDF58C06F0511EBAF54B583C798CF21","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3c5d5","text":"Additionally, mechanically lyse the cells passing them through a pre-cooled douncer for 3x (10x pestle A followed by 10x pestle B).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ajd68","text":"Clear the lysate by spinning it in a Backman centrifuge, at 25K using a Ti45 Rotor for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":87,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e9efo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"FBC148C06F0511EBAF54B583C798CF21","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"FE18A6406F0511EBAF54B583C798CF21","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a8qvt","text":"Inject the supernatant onto a 5ml HT column pre-equilibrated with Buffer A at 1ml/min flow rate to allow protein binding.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"55f8m","text":"Wash the column for 5CV with Buffer A at 2 ml/min flow rate to remove unspecific bound proteins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eciho","text":"Elute protein through a step elution gradient in 50mM, 75mM, 100mM, 150mM, 200mM and 300mM Imidazole concentration. Perform the elution at 1ml/min flow rate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6sdqe","text":"Collect a sample from peak fractions of each elution step and check them on a SDS-PAGE (see gel in the \"Guidelines\" section). Pool and concentrate fractions corresponding to the peak containing the protein of interest (usually 200mM and/or 300mM Imid.) by spinning them down at   using a 30 kDa cut-off Amicon Filter to 2 ml in a 5810R centrifuge (Eppendorf).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":277,"length":2}],"data":{}},{"key":"brc9i","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eq1pd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vk5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"1597D1106F0611EBAF54B583C798CF21","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":33}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6p5su","text":"Keep centrifugation steps short ( ) to avoid protein local concentration/aggregation on the filter.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"duration":300,"guid":"C53A51606FFB11EB89A1A5690F9C5E27","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null},"mutability":"","type":"duration"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8d25h","text":"Inject   onto a S200_16/60 column at 4   pre-equilibrated in buffer containing 25mM Hepes pH=7.5, 150mM NaCl and 1mM DTT (see profile in the \"Guidelines\" section).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"airi2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"2","guid":"230F8A406F0611EBAF54B583C798CF21","id":0,"label":"protein","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"91DBF880B0DF11EB84ACA7D340FDB810","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8tj39","text":"Check fractions on a 10% SDS-PAGE (see gel in the \"Guidelines\" section), pool and concentrate down those containing the protein of interest by spinning them at   using a 30kDa cut-off Amicon Filter in a 5810R centrifuge (Eppendorf). Protein elutes at around 72.5ml, a retention volume corresponding to that of a dimeric globular protein of ~150-160 kDa. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e3s7a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cfuph","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ekj0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"38A3FC106F0611EBAF54B583C798CF21","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ccjfc","text":"Keep centrifugation steps short to avoid protein precipitation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aqe41","text":"Measure protein absorbance at A280 is measured with Spectrophotometer against Size Exclusion Chromatography  buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":31,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3fsk","text":"Aliquot the protein, snap freeze it in liquid Nitrogen and store it at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cq3gs","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b7s86","text":"","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkj7n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"4807CDD06F0611EBAF54B583C798CF21","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3pk26","text":"Usually protein activity is kept for 18 months when stored at -80°C.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
